title: Santhana Malligaiyil Lyrics Rajakaliamman
stanzas:
Santhana malligaiyil
thooli katti potten
thaayi nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

veppilai veesikkittu
paattu sollureno
kaettu nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

indha ulagai aalum
theeyikku chella
pullai naanirukken

en kavala theerkka
venaamaaa kanvalaru
theeyi.

Santhana malligaiyil
thooli katti potten
thaayi nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

paambe thalaiyanaithaan
veppilaiye panju meththa.
aathaa kanvalara aariraaro
paadum pulla.

endha oru pillaikkume
indha varam kedaikkala
aanandhame ponguthammaa
vittu vittu kannula.

Aaayi magamaayi
naan enna koduthuvachen.
padham thirupaadham
adhil nenja eduthuvachen.

Santhana malligaiyil
thooli katti potten
thaayi nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

oruvaai unakku
ootti vitta velaiyila
ulagam pasi adangi
uranguthammaa nerathula.

udhattu parukayila
onnu rendu sindhuthadi
atha naan rusi paarthen
mothcham ingu vandhathadi.

theeye ini neeye
en nenjinil thangividu
poogum vazhiyaavum
nee engaludan kooda iru.

Santhana malligaiyil
thooli katti potten
thaayi nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

veppilai veesikkittu
paattu sollureno
kaettu nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo

indha ulagai aalum
theeyikku chella
pullai naanirukken

en kavala theerkka
venaamaaa kanvalaru
theeyi.

Santhana malligaiyil
thooli katti potten
thaayi nee kanvalaru
thaalelallelo
